note:
LivingCeremony.org ™ &
"ANCESTORS of the 4 DIRECTIONS" ™
supports all races and colors pursuing sensitivity, humility, integrity. This mandates the deep work of decolonization of one's mind & heartset & a move into humane-ness.

We are Indigenous Elders & Folk Reps from the 4 Directions and all around the world who educate on
Earth Ways

Wisdom
Survival
Healing Racism
the Environment
